00014 Resource *interruptsResource = NULL;

00021 void DigitalInput::InitDigitalInput(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel)
00022 {
00023     Resource::CreateResourceObject(&interruptsResource, 8);
00024     CheckDigitalChannel(channel);
00025     CheckDigitalModule(slot);
00026     m_channel = channel;
00027     m_module = DigitalModule::GetInstance(slot);
00028     m_module->AllocateDIO(channel, true);
00029 }
00030 
00035 DigitalInput::DigitalInput(UINT32 channel)
00036 {
00037     InitDigitalInput(GetDefaultDigitalModule(), channel);
00038 }
00039 
00044 DigitalInput::DigitalInput(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel)
00045 {
00046     InitDigitalInput(slot, channel);
00047 }
00048 
00052 DigitalInput::~DigitalInput()
00053 {
00054     if (m_manager != NULL)
00055     {
00056         delete m_manager;
00057         delete m_interrupt;
00058         interruptsResource->Free(m_interruptIndex);
00059     }
00060     m_module->FreeDIO(m_channel);
00061 }
00062 
00063 /*
00064  * Get the value from a digital input channel.
00065  * Retrieve the value of a single digital input channel from the FPGA.
00066  */
00067 UINT32 DigitalInput::Get()
00068 {
00069     return m_module->GetDIO(m_channel);
00070 }
00071 
00075 UINT32 DigitalInput::GetChannel()
00076 {
00077     return m_channel;
00078 }
00079 
00083 UINT32 DigitalInput::GetChannelForRouting()
00084 {
00085     return DigitalModule::RemapDigitalChannel(GetChannel() - 1);
00086 }
00087 
00091 UINT32 DigitalInput::GetModuleForRouting()
00092 {
00093     return DigitalModule::SlotToIndex(m_module->GetSlot());
00094 }
00095 
00099 bool DigitalInput::GetAnalogTriggerForRouting()
00100 {
00101     return false;
00102 }
00103 
00112 void DigitalInput::RequestInterrupts(tInterruptHandler handler, void *param)
00113 {
00114     m_interruptIndex = interruptsResource->Allocate();
00115 //TODO: check for error on allocation
00116 
00117     // Creates a manager too
00118     AllocateInterrupts(false);
00119 
00120     m_interrupt->writeConfig_WaitForAck(false, &status);
00121     m_interrupt->writeConfig_Source_AnalogTrigger(GetAnalogTriggerForRouting(), &status);
00122     m_interrupt->writeConfig_Source_Channel(GetChannelForRouting(), &status);
00123     m_interrupt->writeConfig_Source_Module(GetModuleForRouting(), &status);
00124     SetUpSourceEdge(true, false);
00125 
00126     m_manager->registerHandler(handler, param, &status);
00127     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00128 }
00129 
00136 void DigitalInput::RequestInterrupts()
00137 {
00138     m_interruptIndex = interruptsResource->Allocate();
00139 //TODO: check for errors
00140 
00141     AllocateInterrupts(true);
00142 
00143     m_interrupt->writeConfig_Source_AnalogTrigger(GetAnalogTriggerForRouting(), &status);
00144     m_interrupt->writeConfig_Source_Channel(GetChannelForRouting(), &status);
00145     m_interrupt->writeConfig_Source_Module(GetModuleForRouting(), &status);
00146     SetUpSourceEdge(true, false);
00147     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00148 }
00149 
00150 void DigitalInput::SetUpSourceEdge(bool risingEdge, bool fallingEdge)
00151 {
00152     wpi_assert(m_interrupt != NULL);
00153     if (m_interrupt != NULL)
00154     {
00155         m_interrupt->writeConfig_RisingEdge(risingEdge, &status);
00156         m_interrupt->writeConfig_FallingEdge(fallingEdge, &status);
00157     }
00158     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00159 }
